dialogue.introduction: It's the English-born returnee, Kongou! Nice to meet you!
dialogue.library_intro: The super-dreadnought fitted with Western technology at Vickers in England, Kongou has arrived! Even in the Pacific Theatre, I'll use the power of my speed to be of great use! Look forward to it!
dialogue.secretary2: Hey! Admiral! I don't mind you touching me, but there's a time and place for everything!
dialogue.secretaryidle: I told you to keep your eyes on me~! Admiral~, just what are you doing?!
dialogue.secretarymarried: HEY! Admiral~ Even though you're always doing your best, I want you to not push yourself so hard~!
dialogue.wedding: Admiral~ even though it's the time and place, if you forget the mood and timing... it'll be a 'No', you know?
dialogue.show_players_score: Admiral! You've got mail! Love Letters aren't allowed!
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Now it's our turn! Follow me! Everyone, follow up!
dialogue.equipment1: Yes! I will show you what I'm made of!
dialogue.equipment2: It feels like I've finally became my true self!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Always got to make time for tea-time.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Oh... seems like my exertions are catching up to me.
dialogue.docking_complete: The ship has returned from the Repair!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: I will be the one wins over the Admiral's heart!
dialogue.night_battle: You think I'm finished?! Think again! I'm not going anywhere once I lock onto you!
dialogue.mvp: Did you see my exploits? I'll do even better, so don't look away!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Shit! The precious equipment I got from the admiral!
dialogue.sunk: Admiral... May your fortunes hold... I'll... be watching from Valhalla...
dialogue.white_day_2015: Hey, Admiral. What's your big White Day return gift for me?
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Hey, Teitoku~! It's the second anniversary! Congratulations!!!
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Oh, the rainy season of Tsuyu! I am not fond of it! Boo!
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Summer Season! It has arrived, deeesu! Hiei, where's my swimsuit? Eh? Nothing?
dialogue.christmas_2015: Hey, admiral! Merrrrryyyy... CHRISTMAS TO YOU!! Now, hurry up and give me a present! Come on... come on... Ah, he ran away! Wait!
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Oh! It's already December. Time goes fast, doesn't it, Admiral. Homeport's in need of a major cleanup? You can count on me!
dialogue.new_year_2016: Ah, Happy New Year! Admiral, It is a pleasure as a Kongou-class fast battleship to be of service in this new year!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Hey, admiral~! For this year's Setsubun, we, the Kongou-class sisters will be directing the occasion! First off, the demon role... Ah, admiral~ Why are you running away~!?

hourly.0100: 1 A.M. The Admiral sure is a hard worker.
hourly.0200: Two... a..m... Just when are you working 'till... zzz...
hourly.0300: Three... a..m... I'm just sleeping now...
hourly.0400: Four... a..m... The admiral is here too... zzz... Admiral?
hourly.0500: 5 A.M. Hmm? Did I just hear Hiei screaming?
hourly.0600: Good morning! It's 6 in the morning! Admiral~ You're cool in the morning!
hourly.0700: 7 in the morning! Admiral, what are you having for breakfast?
hourly.0800: It's 8 A.M. Wow! You're having Natto in the morning? It's that food you stir and mix, right?
hourly.0900: It's 9 A.M. I tasted Japanese breakfast!
hourly.1000: Ten o'clock! Morning work, come on!
hourly.1100: Eleven~! Hey, Admiral~... Just looking at you never gets old!
hourly.1200: It's the midday announcement! It's time for lunch!
hourly.1300: 1 P.M.! The Admiral's lunch is natto again? Black Tea... doesn't go well with... it...
hourly.1400: 2 P.M. It's almost tea time! I've got scones waiting for you!
hourly.1500: 3 P.M. Tea time with the Admiral! Mmmmm, black tea is delicious♪
hourly.1600: 4 P.M. HEY Admiral~ How about having one of my hand-made scones?
hourly.1700: Evening, five o'clock. My feelings for Admiral won't lose to anyone else's!
hourly.1800: 6 P.M., I'll be making English-style curry for the Admiral tonight!
hourly.1900: A time signal? I'm making soup right now. Please don't talk to me.
hourly.2000: It's 8 P.M. HEY! ADMIRAL! Kongou's English-style curry is done! Eat up!
hourly.2100: 9 P.M. There are no ingredients in curry? No problem♪ Its all mixed together!
hourly.2200: It's 10 P.M! Admiral~ Another day of hard work! Let's do our best together tomorrow too!
hourly.2300: It's almost 'good night' time! I'll be Admiral's time keeper tomorrow too!
